subject: Refound on Pedals and Vam Pro
description_text:
Goodmorning, today I recieved rhe order number #SSN4713.
There are 2 major problems:
-Vam Pro Haptic motors is not in the box!
-Pedals have Load Cell Sensor not working!!!!

Please instruct me on how to do the refound, thank you,
Luca Cengia.

conversations.body_text: Hi Luca Cengia,    Please provide a side-view installation photo of the brake pedal. In addition, after adjusting the damping, you need to reset the Offset. Follow the instructions to bring the white raw signal close to 0%, then recalibrate the pedal. Once the pedal test shows a normal range from 0% to 100%, you can bind it in the game.  Regarding the VAM Pro, I will check the shipping status for you today. It is shipped separately in a different package.
